annotation.text: MBL dimers, trimers, and tetramers were eluted as overlapping peaks from the column and were identified based on their migration pattern on SDS-polyacrylamide gels, under nonreducing conditions.

MBL dimers, trimers, and tetramers were eluted as overlapping peaks from the column and were identified based on their migration pattern on SDS-polyacrylamide gels, under nonreducing conditions.
Quantities of rat MBL sufficient to enable a detailed study of its structural organization were produced in Chinese hamster ovary cells and purified by affinity chromatography on mannose-Sepharose.
Quantities of rat MBL sufficient to enable a detailed study of its structural organization were produced in Chinese hamster ovary cells and purified by affinity chromatography on mannose-Sepharose.
